verbose_text: Within the patient group with expression of PD-L1 in a tumor biopsy, the majority of patients do not respond to the blockade treatment, indicating that the expression of PD-L1 on its own is not always sufficient for treatment response prediction, likely because of a lack of immune activation--potentially linked to a low tumor mutational burden--or because of resistance mechanisms, e.g., the role of PD-L1 expression on host cells XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
